author: Reuters Editorial
title: Argentina sells Treasury notes, local bond for $2.506 bln
text:
BUENOS AIRES, April 25 (Reuters) - Argentina sold Treasury notes for $1.070 billion to refinance maturing debt and a local currency bond due in 2025 worth 29.098 billion pesos ($1.436 billion), the Finance Ministry said on Wednesday.
The government sold $670 million in 217-day notes with a nominal annual interest rate of 3.05 percent and $400 million in 364-day notes with a rate of 3.69 percent, it said. (Reporting by Maximiliano Rizzi; Writing by Caroline Stauffer; Editing by Dan Grebler)
